ygData.subject: RE: Don't laugh at this question
ygData.msgSnippet: Ogre Bouncers got me through 45th in about 8 evenings.  They re good experience but nearly impervious to magic.  Bring your weapons and party buffs. [47 Bard]
ygData.messageBody:
Ogre Bouncers got me through 45th in about 8 evenings. They're good
experience but nearly impervious to magic. Bring your weapons and party
buffs.

[47 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work

> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Was wondering if there is a good place for me to solo at 35th
> level? Spent
> four hours in Sol A last night in a party and killed a ton of
> blue goblins.
> I got maybe 3/4 bar of EXP. The camp was safe but actually pretty boring.
> I'm willing to take a risk soloing if it will help me get out of
> 35th. I'm
> thinking about the only place for me to solo at 35 is Rathe Mtns charming
> giants against one another. Anyone got a better suggestion.
> Would it just
> be better to join a group in one of the dungeons or kill ogre bouncers?
>
> Galtin of E'ci
